message.content: Let me see more of this test to understand the issue:

content:
Here's the result of running `cat -n` on /workspace/SheepVibes/backend/test_app.py:
   530	    feed_id = setup_tabs_and_feeds["feed1_id"]
   531	    new_url = "https://example.com/new-feed.xml"
   532	    
   533	    # Mock the feed fetch to return a valid feed
   534	    mock_feed = MagicMock()
   535	    mock_feed.feed = {
   536	        'title': 'New Feed Title',
   537	        'link': 'https://example.com'
   538	    }
   539	    mock_fetch_feed.return_value = mock_feed
   540	    mock_fetch_and_update.return_value = (True, 2)  # success, num_new_items
   541	    
   542	    response = client.put(f'/api/feeds/{feed_id}', json={'url': new_url})
   543	    
   544	    assert response.status_code == 200
   545	    data = response.json
   546	    assert data['url'] == new_url
   547	    assert data['name'] == 'New Feed Title'
   548	    assert data['site_link'] == 'https://example.com'
   549	    
   550	    mock_fetch_feed.assert_called_once_with(new_url)
   551	    mock_fetch_and_update.assert_called_once_with(feed_id)
   552	
   553	@patch('backend.app.fetch_feed')
   554	def test_update_feed_url_fetch_fails(mock_fetch_feed, client, setup_tabs_and_feeds):
   555	    """Test PUT /api/feeds/<feed_id> when feed fetch fails."""
